abstract: Common, the rapper turned actor, plays a former slave who helps build the Union Pacific Railroad, in AMC’s television series Hell on Wheels.
snippet: Common, the rapper turned actor, plays a former slave who helps build the Union Pacific Railroad, in AMC’s series, “Hell on Wheels,” which has its premiere in November.
lead_paragraph: Common, the rapper turned actor, plays a former slave who helps build the Union Pacific Railroad, in AMC’s series, “Hell on Wheels,” which has its premiere in November.

headline.main: Building a Railroad and a New Life on the Frontier
headline.print_headline: Building a Railroad And a New Life On the Frontier
headline.seo: Common Stars in AMC’s ‘Hell on Wheels’
